description: Impose changing emissions of RCP Y short lived gas species including CH4, Nox, VOCs and CO.
name: RCPYShortLivedGasSpecies
rationale: Represents a very low forcing scenario with the goal of limiting global mean warming to 1.5°C above pre-industrial levels based on the Paris COP21 agreement.
longName: Representative Concentration Pathway Y Short Lived Gas Species
keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway Y, future, scenario, SSPx, RCPy, short-lived gas
